title: 打算揾Anonymous 幫手hack入黨鐵攞831 cctv，佢哋覆咗！

出黎呀，自由閪！


不闖入、不塗鴉、不鐳射
如有發現，批淮大家往死裡打

明日之公眾集會(遮打花園)及公眾遊行(前往美領)已獲發不反對通知書。

集會部分
地點：中環遮打花園
時間：13:30 - 18:30
四節主題：時代子民、獄中讚歌、審判將至、天佑美國

※※ 遮打現場將收集香港人權與民主宣言聯署至14:30﹐隨後出發向美領遞交 ※※

遊行部分
集合地點：中環遮打花園金鐘道出口
集合時間：14:30
遊行路線：遮打花園經花園道往下亞厘畢道巴士站公眾活動區，向美國領事館遞交請願信

所有集會開始前，應先唱頌或奏《願榮光歸香港》

參加者應當起立，肅立致敬
右手置於心胸前
任何非宗教的頭飾應摘除並放置於左肩
堅唔堅

[認真] 既然要國際支援，點解唔講出嚟？
https://lih.kg/1546622
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

唔知有冇用，不如係星期日試吓？
點樣可以搵到英文文宣
唔知真唔真 但照推

replies.msg:
你地想睇咩？邊日、幾多個站？我本來諗住 Reddit 開 post
Title: Just an interesting thought. Can we ask Anonymous to hack into the MTR system and retrieve the CCTV recordings?

Source: https://www.instagram.com/p/B2EkmZMgNjl/?igshid=1iayfuavxg5r2

On 31st August, police indifferently assaulted and arrested passengers they find suspicious, at least 2 were found unconscious in reporters' video tapes, but the Prince Edward station was closed down for 2 days, and there has been mismatch among the number of patients.

This is a news article from HKFP. https://www.hongkongfp.com/2019/09/06/hong-kong-lawmaker-protesters-demand-cctv-footage-police-storming-mtr-station/
Here are some video tapes of that night. https://www.instagram.com/p/B11dL0ql1a9/?igshid=igullnknoims
They even refused First Aiders to offer humanitarian help. https://www.instagram.com/p/B11nydahLjT/?igshid=1pybx75fl3c2c

Many suspect police had beaten at least two passengers to death, and what happened in those 48 hours in Prince Edward station is still unknown. Police denies it is an indifferent beating, and did not confess if there are deaths on 8.31. https://www.facebook.com/HongKongPoliceForce/videos/369014330686192/

MTR has promised to keep the videos for 3 years, but refused to disclose them to the public. https://news.rthk.hk/rthk/en/component/k2/1479129-20190906.htm Some fear the videos would be edited. Many demand a fair, truthful answer to what happened, and wish to see the CCTV on 31/8/2019 to 1/9/2019 of Prince Edward, （而家揾緊你地想睇邊幾個站）

8.31 is not the only night that police has used brutality (Especially San Uk Ling Holding Centre on 8.11, which is an even bigger mystery and injustice than 8.31.)

Not to mention police brutality is not the main theme in this AntiELAB movement.

If you have more information about 8.31 that the public should know, please comment down below. This is not a complete post.

我寫咗咁多
我就想解釋發生乜事，可唔可以大家一齊傾寫乜比佢地？集思廣益

replies.msg:
英文文宣組整咗簡短version

Please help us obtain CCTV footage of a few metro stations in Hong Kong on Aug 31 and Sept 1. On Aug 31 the police attacked Hong Kong citizens indiscriminately in the metro station called Prince Edward MTR station. They closed off access to the station for 2 days and prevented medic from entering. The MTR company has refused to release CCTV footage so far and many suspected some citizens were killed during the attack. Because the metro company will only keep CCTV footage for a period of time, we need to act asap. Please help us obtain CCTV footage of the station "Prince Edward", "Mong Kok", "Yau Ma Tei" and "Lai Chi Kok" Aug 31 and Sept 1 so the Hong Kong people can find justice.

Dear Anonymous,

Hong Kong is under a humanitarian crisis right now. Ever since the anti-extradition bill movement broke out back in early June 2019, the Hong Kong police were constantly using unnecessary brutality towards protesters, journalist and even first aiders. And now Hong Kong has became a Police State where you could be arrested just because you are wearing a black tee-shirt.

The police is entirely out of control. They have been ignoring all those police protocols and even violated the Geneva Conventions. They shoot protester, first aiders and journalist right in the eye with a bean bag bullet, there were 3 people who have lost their eye sight permanently because of that.

On the 31st of August, the Hong Kong police rushed into the Prince Edward metro station, brutality beaten up normal citizens, not matter whether they were protestors or not. Some of them were beaten up to unconscious, they should have been taken to the hospital right away but nobody knows where they are right now! There are also mysterious suicide cases happening in Hong Kong right after the 8/31 terror attack. There are rumors saying there are 6 people who was beaten up to death by the police and when their family tired to meet them, the police would lock them up and tried to silence them.

We the Hong Kongers are now suspecting that those “suicide cases” are just the cover up for the truth. We urge the MTR (metro company) to hand out the CCTV of that day in order to let us have to bigger picture of whether the police killed the protesters. All we wanted to know is the truth. As you guys have posted a video on youtube on 3rd of August, supporting us Hong Kongers to fight against this brutal regime, we sincerely hope that our peers are safe and sound, and if not, we do not want to let the murders police to get away easily! ALL WE WANTED IS THE TRUTH! Please help and save Hong Kong!

我之前都send 左上面呢段過去，希望佢地會覆
